heads up:

  • https://github.com/bytecodealliance/rfcs/pull/3
  • https://github.com/bytecodealliance/rfcs/pull/4
RFC: benchmarking infrastructure. by cfallin · Pull Request #3 · bytecodealliance/rfcs
This RFC proposes establishing a benchmarking infrastructure for Cranelift/wasmtime. rendered
Create and maintain a benchmarking suite for Wasmtime by fitzgen · Pull Request #4 · bytecodealliance/rfcs
Rendered RFC Note: this is complimentary to RFC #3. Where that RFC is seeking consensus on whether we should establish benchmarking infrastructure at all, this RFC focuses on defining where we wan...
From the benchmarking infrastructure RFC, Potentially we should also sandbox in other ways;. Wait a minute, wasm is a sandbox, so we just need to run wasmtime in wasmtime to benchmark wasmtime :eyes:
